name: coding-tasks
description: Basic coding challenges in multiple languages

test_cases.prompt: Write a Python function that implements FizzBuzz for numbers 1 to {{n}}. Return only the code, no explanation.
Write a Rust function to reverse a string in-place. Return only the code.
Implement a {{lang}} function to calculate the nth Fibonacci number using recursion. Return only the code.
Write a function in any language that checks if a string is a palindrome. Include test cases.
Implement binary search in Python with proper handling of edge cases. Return code with comments.
